attributes.name: open-default
attributes.description: Default the panel to open

attributes.name: hide-export-button
attributes.description:
Hide the export button, showing it is good for developers
or those doing QA testing of new elements.
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
       * Hide the export button, showing it is good for developers
       * or those doing QA testing of new elements.
       */

attributes.name: hide-panel-ops
attributes.description: Hide the panel operations (save and cancel),

attributes.name: hide-preferences-button
attributes.description: Hide preferences button

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Direction to align the hax edit panel

attributes.name: allowed-tags
attributes.description:
allowed Tags, usually as dictated by the input filtering
layer of the backend system that HAX is riding on.
While not fullproof, this at least will enforce front-end
filtering to match what actually is going to be allowed
to be saved in the first place.
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
       * allowed Tags, usually as dictated by the input filtering
       * layer of the backend system that HAX is riding on.
       * While not fullproof, this at least will enforce front-end
       * filtering to match what actually is going to be allowed
       * to be saved in the first place.
       */

attributes.name: end-point
attributes.description: Location to save content to.

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: Method to save content.

attributes.name: update-page-data
attributes.description: Page data, body of text as a string.

attributes.name: app-store-connection
attributes.description: Connection object for talking to an app store.

attributes.name: edit-mode
attributes.description: State of the panel

attributes.name: sync-body
attributes.description: syncBody

attributes.name: body-value
attributes.description: Only available if syncBody is true; this allows data binding to the value being worked on in hax-body tag

attributes.name: hide-message
attributes.description: Flag to hide the toast.

attributes.name: redirect-location
attributes.description: Optional URL to redirect to once we save.

attributes.name: redirect-on-save
attributes.description: Option to redirect once we save successfully

attributes.name: active-hax-body
attributes.description: Reference to activeBody.

tags.name:
cms-block
`Render and process a  / block from a content management system.`
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `cms-block`
 * @customElement cms-block
 * `Render and process a  / block from a content management system.`
 */

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Loading state

attributes.name: block-module
attributes.description: Module supplying the block

attributes.name: block-delta
attributes.description: A delta value relative to the module

attributes.name: block-end-point
attributes.description: block end point updated, change the way we do processing.

attributes.name: body-data
attributes.description: Body data which is just block with some encapsulation.

attributes.name: block-data
attributes.description: block data from the end point.

attributes.name: block-prefix
attributes.description: Prefix for the block to be processed

attributes.name: block-suffix
attributes.description: Suffix for the block to be processed

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Loading state

properties.name: blockModule
properties.description: Module supplying the block

properties.name: blockDelta
properties.description: A delta value relative to the module

properties.name: blockEndPoint
properties.description: block end point updated, change the way we do processing.

properties.name: bodyData
properties.description: Body data which is just block with some encapsulation.

properties.name: blockData
properties.description: block data from the end point.

properties.name: blockPrefix
properties.description: Prefix for the block to be processed

properties.name: blockSuffix
properties.description: Suffix for the block to be processed

tags.name:
cms-entity
`Render and process a  / entity from a content management system.`
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `cms-entity`
 * @customElement cms-entity
 * `Render and process a  / entity from a content management system.`
 */

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Loading state

attributes.name: entity-type
attributes.description: Type of entity to load

attributes.name: entity-id
attributes.description: ID of the item to load

attributes.name: entity-display-mode
attributes.description: Display mode of the entity

attributes.name: entity-end-point
attributes.description: entity end point updated, change the way we do processing.

attributes.name: body-data
attributes.description: Body data which is just entity with some encapsulation.

attributes.name: entity-data
attributes.description: entity data from the end point.

attributes.name: entity-prefix
attributes.description: Prefix for the entity to be processed

attributes.name: entity-suffix
attributes.description: Suffix for the entity to be processed

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Loading state

properties.name: entityType
properties.description: Type of entity to load

properties.name: entityId
properties.description: ID of the item to load

properties.name: entityDisplayMode
properties.description: Display mode of the entity

properties.name: entityEndPoint
properties.description: entity end point updated, change the way we do processing.

properties.name: bodyData
properties.description: Body data which is just entity with some encapsulation.

properties.name: entityData
properties.description: entity data from the end point.

properties.name: entityPrefix
properties.description: Prefix for the entity to be processed

properties.name: entitySuffix
properties.description: Suffix for the entity to be processed

tags.name:
cms-views
`Render and process a  / views from a content management system.`
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * `cms-views`
 * @customElement cms-views
 * `Render and process a  / views from a content management system.`
 */

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Loading state

attributes.name: views-name
attributes.description: Name of the views to render

attributes.name: views-display
attributes.description: Display from the views

attributes.name: views-end-point
attributes.description: views end point updated, change the way we do processing.

attributes.name: body-data
attributes.description: Body data which is just views with some encapsulation.

attributes.name: views-data
attributes.description: views data from the end point.

attributes.name: views-prefix
attributes.description: Prefix for the views to be processed

attributes.name: views-suffix
attributes.description: Suffix for the views to be processed

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Loading state

properties.name: viewsName
properties.description: Name of the views to render

properties.name: viewsDisplay
properties.description: Display from the views

properties.name: viewsEndPoint
properties.description: views end point updated, change the way we do processing.

properties.name: bodyData
properties.description: Body data which is just views with some encapsulation.

properties.name: viewsData
properties.description: views data from the end point.

properties.name: viewsPrefix
properties.description: Prefix for the views to be processed

properties.name: viewsSuffix
properties.description: Suffix for the views to be processed
